attributes.review: As any trump loving dummy would do I download this app to keep up with that handsome Cheeto 👁👅👁 but it took 365 days to download 😾😾 then the app proceeded to steal all $69 in my PayPal 😤 so if you want to get this app you better be ready to sacrifice anything and everything... even your cats life 😎 that’s right the app sent drones DRONES to MY house and stole my cat up into the air and just left! attributes.title: The app is TRASH

attributes.review: Honestly, I don’t know about what others are talking about when they mentioned the Chinese government hacking their phone because of this app, because all of that didn’t happen to me... Instead, once I downloaded the app, Donald Trump jumped out of my phone and started peeing all over my face!! 😡😡 I was so terrified I didn’t know what to do or act!!! Not only did he pee on my face, but he took a huge dump on my couch, and farted on my bed to top it all off. Once it was all over, he made his way back to my phone and jumped it. Literally one of the WORST experiences I’ve encountered when downloading an app! 110% DO NOT recommend!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review:
Look, I’m all for keeping up with “presidential candidates”...but this app is awful. First of all it’s super buggy and second of all like every five seconds wants me to make in-app purchases. Also it’s not supposed to take up much space but my iPhone kept telling me storage was full?? And it takes forever to load and kicks me out back to the home screen every time. That’s with my SECOND phone - my first phone legit broke. I was on the app and a pop up to give money cane up - not that he needs more money - and it wouldn’t let me reject the offer and then I tried to close the app and couldn’t then eventually it ran out of battery and hasn’t turned on since! Plus the app is designed terribly and the graphics and it’s NOT USER FRIENDLY. 
Also I kept looking for pics of the president but I just kept seeing some old dude looking like 🍊and 🤡 mixed together with the brain of 🍊 and the social skills of 🤡 and the general...

So basically this app is trash.

And the candidate is trash. 💕
attributes.title: BROKE MY PHONE
